pr_title: Feature: Lecture Modularisation | Exercise Units and Attachment Units

timeline.message: Added javadoc comments to pass checkstyle
Implemented functionality to creater / update learning goals
Removed Learning Goal Frontend as it belongs in a different PR
Removed Server Parts not belonging to this PR
Basic Routing Setup For Lecture Module Management
Fixed Small Mistake in Translation File
Created Models for HTMLModule on the Client Side
updated entities according to advisor feedback
Changed Name from HTML to Text
Added translation for lecture unit order update
Implemented Release Date Blocking for Lecture Units
Removed distracting lecture unit order update alert
Added Lecture Unit Section to Lecture Page

Refactored Creation of Attachment Unit into Create Component and Form
Component

Made sure that when exercises are delete the corresponding
exercise units are also deleted
Added file upload error to creation page

timeline.bodyText: Codacy found an issue: Useless parentheses.
